Video of “the market of terror, where the coronavirus originated”. The video was transmitted by many Macedonian media outlets but it is false. The truth is that this video is not of a market in Wuhan, nor anywhere in China, but it is of a market in Indonesia. When you play the video you can see the name of the market in large letters, i.e. Pasar Estream Langowan. It  is in Indonesia, not in China.
Coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 is a weapon developed in a chinese lab. The rumors mix false and true information, but give no evidence its claim would be correct.
Video of Wuhan market where the new coronavirus started to spread. The video is from a market in Indonesia.
China built a hospital in 48 hours to receive new coronavirus patients. Please click the link to read the full article

North Korean leader will execute anyone who is infected with the new coronavirus. No information about this has been found in the official North Korean agencies or among the international news agencies.
People lying in the street in China because of the new coronavirus. It was an artistic performance held in Germany in 2014.

All the soldiers in South Korea cannot go on leave because of the novel coronavirus(2019-nCoV) outbreak. South Korea's ministry of national defense said, "The restrictions on all soldiers are not true at all. However, we only partially limited the area where there were confirmed cases."

The Chinese government announced that “garlic is a preventative food for the the novel coronavirus.” The official document is not from China's central government. It's from Shanghai city government. On this original document, there is no mention about garlic or preventive food.

Novel coronavirus can be transmitted by packages and/or imported goods shipped from China to Korea. There is currently no evidence to support that the novel coronavirus can be transmitted through imported goods.

The lab from which the coronavirus originated has a similar symbol as the lab responsible for a mass outbreak in the Resident Evil games. The source of the new coronavirus outbreak in Wuhan has not yet been identified. The lab is based in Shanghai, not Wuhan and there is no reason to think it has anything to do with the new coronavirus.
Jacob Rothschild owns a patent to coronavirus. Incorrect. There is no patent to the new coronavirus discovered recently in Wuhan.
Coronavirus killed 10,000 people in Wuhan. Please click the link to read the full article

China constructed a hospital for the new coronavirus in 48 hours. The building has been under construction since 2018. China has accommodated the building with 1.000 beds for the new coronavirus patients.

The Umbrella Corporation, from the video game Resident Evil, is linked to the Chinese company RLSW. The Chinese company RLSW is engaged in genetic testing and advanced scientific research. However, the address on Google Maps could not be corroborated and the official site does not offer much information.

Posts saying that, for several centuries, there have been pandemics in the 20’s. The information in the post are inaccurate. The pandemics listed in the post occurred years before of years after the 20's, in each centuries.
A person died of hematemesis in Beitou. He was then diagnosed with 2019n-Cov. Wear a mask in Taipei. There was no death case in Taiwan (1/28/2020).
Chinese panic video over coronavirus. The video shows that Yulin residents working in Guangdong returned to their hometown to celebrate the spring festival.

Prevent coronavirus by drinking warm water. The message did not come from the Indonesian Ministry of Health. And there is no research that supports that drinking warm water can prevent transmission of the virus.

The virus is entirely different from all the known virus forms. It activates all bacterias and other viruses in human body. The nCOV virus is genetically related with the other coronaviruses detected before. All infections can activate other infections in humans.

The virus is entirely different from all the known virus forms. It activates all bacterias and other viruses in human body. The nCOV virus is genetically related with the other coronaviruses detected before. All infections can activate other infections in humans.
Coronavirus was made in a lab, with pre existing patents for a vaccine. The Bill and Melinda Gates foundation is involved in spreading the coronavirus. Please click the link to read the full article
Picture of the first new Wuhan coronavirus hospital. This is a stock picture of a modular construction from a Chinese import-export company.
A man collapses in a staircase because of the CoV. The authorities and building management said he fainted for other reasons.

The Chinese company Ruilan Bao Hu San Biotech Limited is the origin of the novel coronavirus. Its logo resemble the Umbrella Corporation, from the video game Resident Evil. The company is based in Shanghai, 840 km away from Wuhan. Virus origin is still unknown.

WHO advises population to avoid having unprotected sex with animals. Posts presented an edited version of an image posted by WHO on Twitter in January 27. In the original publication, the organization advised people to avoid contact with wild and farm animals.

Doctors recommend vitamin C and fennel seed tea to help avoid the novel coronavirus. There is no scientific evidence to support the claim that vitamin C or fennel seed tea are effective in the treatment or prevention of the novel coronavirus.

Vitamin C with zinc prevent and treat the coronavirus infection. According to WHO, there is still no remedy to treat the 2019-nCoV virus and preventive measures include washing your hands frequently and avoiding contact with infected people, not taking vitamin C with zinc.

Government of India recommends homeopathy and other alternative medicines for preventing coronavirus. THe World Health Organization has stated that there are no proved preventions and treatments for this virus. The mechanisms mentioned by the AYUSH ministry are not scientifically proven to help in tackling coronaviruses.
This video shows a seafood market in Wuhan, China. This video is of the Langowan market in Indonesia and not of the Wuhan seafood market.

Video of a girl dying of coronavirus in a shopping mall. The video is from Malaysia where the girl died due to a heart failure and not coronavirus. BOOM corroborated the theory with a family member of the deceased
Chinese people rush to Japan to abuse Japanese health insurance system. According to Ministry of Health, this information is mostly false.

A tweet entitled “Risk of novel coronavirus and countermeasures” saying “The virus stays alive for 48 hours.” “The clothes need to be disinfected with alcohol and goggles to prevent corneal infection.” “Die without fever.” According to the Virology Expert; Inactivation will not take 48 hours. No cases have been reported of death without fever. It is difficult to completely disinfect outerwear with alcohol. Goggles are not generally needed. Not an artificial virus.
The first patient diagnosed in Ecuador with COVID-19 died. (Jan. 29) The patient was still alive in Jan. 29

The article includes a compilation of different false claims and manipulative photos: 1) false claim saying that there was identified infected person in Georgia, 2) false claim about banana being a source of spread of coronavirus, 3) false claim saying that chinese passengers getting fever medication, 4) false claim about Georgian doctors refusing to screen passengers on the coronavirus in the airport Please click the link to read the full article

Ministry of health’s emergency notified the public about the new coronavirus outbreak. (Jan. 29) The advisory message has not been issued by the Health Ministry. Also, in the precautions released by the Ministry, there is nothing related to keeping the throat moist.

Video of a girl dying of coronavirus. The girl in the video has not died due to coronavirus. The family of the girl and the Malaysian Health Ministry have confirmed that the rumours about the girl’s death are FALSE.
Video of a market in Wuhan (China), the suspected origin of the coronavirus outbreak. The video was taken at an animal market in Langowan (Indonesia). It is not related to Wuhan (China).
Statistics are predicting millions of dead people and billions of infected people in a few days. There is no modelization of the virus yet. So it's impossible to predict anything about the epidemic.

“Japan has sent many masks to Wuhan, China. But China hasn’t supported Japan ever before.” China sent their rescue team and many goods at Great East Japan earthquake (2011), donated a lot of money to Japan at the 2016 Kumamoto Earthquake, and the Heavy Rain of July, 2018.

A team from @WorldPopProject has heat mapped the highest risk counties for the #Wuhancoronavirus. “Japan is the second country in the list because Abe’s administration doesn’t enforce immigration restrictions.” The ranking is based on Lunar New Year travel prior to the holiday in 2018. This report does not refer to any countries immigration restrictions in this year. Japan is the second highest risk country but it's not related to the immigration policy.

The Korean Government pay travellers’ medical expense for coronavirus without legal basis. According to IHR 2005, government is responsible for paying medical treatment expense to travellers. Accordingly, related Act also defines it.
Coronavirus is in Des Moines. (Jan. 29) The story came from a prank website where it got over 9,000 Facebook engagements

Scripps urgent care in San Diego is on lockdown, two people with the new coronavirus are isolated. Scripps denied it was true through their Twitter account. There was one person with the flu - not the novel coronavirus.
Bill Gates patented the coronavirus. Please click the link to read the full article
A video taken in Wuhan (China), where the coronavirus outbreak started. This is not a video from Wuhan (China). It is a video from Indonesia, recorded in July 2019.
The WHO has recommended to avoid unprotected sex with live wild or farm animals It is a manipulated image of a real advice image from the WHO.
Emergency notification issued by the Spanish Health Ministry about coronavirus Please click the link to read the full article

Death toll in Wuhan due to coronavirus reaches 10,000 people As of Jan. 29, the death toll from the 2019-nCoV virus in China had reached 132 people.

The virus is entirely different from all the known virus forms. It activates all bacterias and other viruses in human body. The nCOV virus is genetically related with the other coronaviruses detected before. All infections can activate other infections in humans.

The Simpsons predicted the epidemic. Osaka flu came from Japan in the related Simpsons episode, not from China.
The movie Venom predicted the epidemic. The movie is not based on an epidemic at all. The character is not infected after eating snake in a marketplace and attack people.
Picture of the first new Wuhan coronavirus hospital. This is a stock picture of a modular construction from a Chinese import-export company.

A photograph that shows people on the floor demonstrates the impact of the new coronavirus in China. The claim along with the photo is false and it is in no way related to the outbreak of coronavirus. It is actually an old photo from Germany dated to 2014. Moreover, the people in the photo are not dead, but were lying down on the road as part of an art project.
MMS can be very effective in both preventing and eradicating the coronavirus. There is still no cure for COVID-19, and health authorities have warned that MMS is dangerous to health.

There is a “positive” case of the novel coronavirus (nCoV) in a hospital in Banlic, Cabuyao City, Laguna, Philippines in January 2020. There was no coronavirus case at the Global Medical Center of Laguna around the time the claim was spread.

Bill Gates predicted and simulated the COVID-19 pandemic. Bill Gates' foundation worked on the possibility that a coronavirus could spread and be responsible of a pandemia. It can't be taken as a prediction because multiple coronavirus have been known for decades. It didn't foresee the current pandemia.
Bats and snakes are responsible of the spread of SARS-CoV-2 This theory is far from proven, it should still be taken with caution.
Image shows people falling on the streets of Wuhan. Upon verification, Misbar found that the image was from 2014.
Health Ministry fired the doctor that diagnosed some coronavirus patients. Please click the link to read the full article
A coronavirus patient has bitten a doctor in the USA. Please click the link to read the full article
25 million infected and 40,000 died in the new coronavirus epidemic. The figures in the claim couldn't be found in any official announcement as of January.
Video that shows a animal market in Wuhan. Please click the link to read the full article
There is an alert of coronavirus in Madrid, Barcelona and Valencia (January 28). As of Jan. 28, there are no cases of coronavirus detected in Spain.
Coronavirus in China: 2.8 million infected and 112,000 dead. It's not true that in China there are 2.8 million infected people and 112,000 dead.

A video that has been linked to the new coronavirus for showing a wholesale market in China and exposing its low–hygiene environment. The video is highly misleading: the market is located in Indonesia -  not in China.

Drinking a bleach solution will prevent you from getting the coronavirus. Officials have repeatedly warned consumers against ingesting it, saying doing so could cause severe vomiting and liver failure.
“Clorox bottle claimed it could kill (the 2019 coronavirus)… before it was developed.” There is no evidence that the 2019 coronavirus was "developed" prior to the outbreak.

Grape vinegar is the antidote of the coronavirus. There is no scientific evidence about the benefits of vinegar in the fight against the disease. The virus is not poison. An antidote would not be useful at all.

Turkish doctor allegedly found coronavirus vaccine. There is no doctor called "Tamer Yirmiüçoğlu." The doctor in the photo is gynecologist Op. Dr. Tamer Gültekin who became famous in 2016 with the vagina bleaching operations.

A video shows the effects of coronavirus and suggest people avoid ice cream and cold drinks for 90 days. Video shown in the viral post showing a person removing larvae from the lips using a pair of tweezers is old and unrelated to coronavirus. The claim in the viral post is also refuted by medical professionals.

A “Wuhan super virus” was created in a Chinese biosecurity lab and has infected more than 100,000 people in Wuhan. There is no evidence that the 2019 Novel coronavirus came from a Chinese laboratory. The WHO says the virus most likely originated in an animal. The number of cases of infection with the coronavirus in Wuhan has not reached 100,000 as claimed in the video.
Keeping your throat moist by drinking water prevents contamination. It's not part of official health recommandations.

Coronavirus patient bites a doctor’s jugular in the USA. The screenshot was doctored. O Globo never published the story, URL redirects to a non-related article. The URL was shortened with a t.co domain, whereas O Globo uses glo.bo in their tweets.
Video showing a larva being extracted from a person’s lip and its relation to the new coronavirus. The viral video has no relation to the 2019 coronavirus. It is an old video, from October 2019.
Avoid ice-creams, cold drinks, and sweets for 90 days to prevent coronavirus. There is no scientific evidence to support that the virus spreads through food items like ice creams and cold drinks.
New coronavirus information: “15% fatality rate, 83% infection rate” and “the worst in human history”. According to Ministry of Health, this information is absolutely false.
10,000 people have died because of coronavirus in Wuhan. WHO data listed only 170 deaths in China at the time of publishing

Person infected with coronavirus bit a doctor’s jugular. This fake news is a reproduction of a Twitter post allegedly published by the Brazilian newspaper O Globo. In fact, the newspaper did not post this information.

China earned 20 billion dollars on coronavirus. Zombie-fake. The same text with a sum of 20 billion and a link (inactive) to the website Faktxeber appeared in 2014 after the annexation of the Crimea, and it featured not China and the leader of the Chinese Communist party, but Russia and Vladimir Putin. As for the Chinese stock markets, they are generally closed until February 3 and transactions are not conducted there.

“Bill and Melinda gates Foundation & others predicted up to 65 million deaths via coronavirus – in simulation ran 3 months ago” InfoWars distorted the facts about an emergency preparedness exercise for a fictional pandemic exercise.
4 people died in Hyderabad (India) due to the 2019 coronavirus. No cases of coronavirus have been reported in India at this time.
KNUST students discover vaccine for coronavirus and cure patient in Côte d’Ivoire. Please click the link to read the full article
Coronavirus was spread via bananas Coronavirus has been transmitted from living organisms (animals). There is  no evidence of bananas or other food products transmitting it.
A video that claims to feature one of the victims of the new coronavirus. The same video was posted on YouTube on October 24th, 2019, before the first case of coronavirus was reported in China.
Video that shows a animal market in Wuhan. Please click the link to read the full article
There is an alert of coronavirus in Madrid, Barcelona and Valencia (January 28). As of Jan. 28, there are no cases of coronavirus detected in Spain.
Coronavirus in China: 2.8 million infected and 112,000 dead. It's not true that in China there are 2.8 million infected people and 112,000 dead.

A video that has been linked to the new coronavirus for showing a wholesale market in China and exposing its low–hygiene environment. The video is highly misleading: the market is located in Indonesia -  not in China.

Drinking a bleach solution will prevent you from getting the coronavirus. Officials have repeatedly warned consumers against ingesting it, saying doing so could cause severe vomiting and liver failure.
Garlic can cure patients infected with the coronavirus There is no research or evidence that proves garlic can cure patients infected with the coronavirus.

Grape vinegar is the antidote of the coronavirus. There is no scientific evidence about the benefits of vinegar in the fight against the disease. The virus is not poison. An antidote would not be useful at all.

The animals in the list in the photo were served at a meeting for 40 thousand people in China, and the virus spread after that day. The animal list, which presented with the prices in the photo, belongs to the list of animals sold in live animal markets in China. And there is no information regarding a meeting of 40 thousand people in this city.

The studies initiated by the “Military Research Institute” transformed the form of virus in 2018. The claim that the virus was developed by a "military institute" is based on an article authored by Dan Hu, who works for Third Military Medical University in China. However, the article does not mention the experiments changed the genetics of the virus. Again, the examples used in the article are stored in the gene bank with a code and these codes are also included in the study. This allows scientists to work on the virus.

The animals in the list in the photo were served at a meeting for 40 thousand people in China, and the virus spread after that day. The animal list, which presented with the prices in the photo, belongs to the list of animals sold in live animal markets in China. And there is no information regarding a meeting of 40 thousand people in this city.

Turkish doctor allegedly found coronavirus vaccine. There is no doctor called "Tamer Yirmiüçoğlu." The doctor in the photo is gynecologist Op. Dr. Tamer Gültekin who became famous in 2016 with the vagina bleaching operations.

“Coronavirus, nasa Pilipinas na (coronavirus, already in the Philippines)” – (Jan. 28) Kabisnes’s false and clickbait headline does not reflect its content. In the video’s first 10 seconds, the show host reads the phrase “Coronavirus, nasa Pilipinas na (coronavirus, already in the Philippines)” then proceeds to say that it was a claim circulating on social media, currently being debunked by Malacanang and DOH.

A positive case of the 2019 novel coronavirus was “confirmed” to be found in Cebu province. The Department of Health announced on Jan. 28 there remains to be no positive case of the 2019 nCoV in the country, only that there are 27 people under investigation for suspected infection.

A video shows the effects of coronavirus and suggest people avoid ice cream and cold drinks for 90 days. Video shown in the viral post showing a person removing larvae from the lips using a pair of tweezers is old and unrelated to coronavirus. The claim in the viral post is also refuted by medical professionals.

The novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) “will not last long” in the Philippines because of its warm climate. The World Health Organization (WHO) has not said that temperature affects the spread of 2019-nCoV and they don't recommend exposure to heat as protection or a treatment for the virus.

Two Filipinos ate bat soup in Wuhan, China, the epicenter of the 2019 novel coronavirus (nCoV), as seen in a video uploaded on Facebook. The original video was taken in Palau and was uploaded on YouTube on July 17, 2019 – at least 5 months before a case of the 2019-nCoV was first reported in Wuhan, China.

The following statement by a Wuhan nurse: “Don’t go out, don’t go to parties, don’t eat out, there are 98.000 infected not 2.700″” On 28 Jan., there were about 4,500 infected in China, note 2,700. Official figures were being published by the Johns Hopkins University, which has no connection to the Chinese government propaganda and is trying to objectively monitor the outbreak of the new coronavirus. A relevant source for an epidemic situation is always a health institution or operational headquarters to fight the epidemic, not an individual.
America predicted the new coronavirus outbreak 9 years ago. This claimed is based on the movie "Contingent".
Video footage of dead animals such as dogs, rats, bats and snakes being sold in a market in Wuhan. The recording was shot in Langowan, Indonesia, not in Wuhan.
Coronavirus firstly appeared in June 2019. The virus was detected in Wuhan, China in late December, not in June 2019 according to Lancet paper, WHO and other sources.

The studies initiated by the “Military Research Institute” transformed the form of virus in 2018. The claim that the virus was developed by a "military institute" is based on an article authored by Dan Hu, who works for Third Military Medical University in China. However, the article does not mention the experiments changed the genetics of the virus. Again, the examples used in the article are stored in the gene bank with a code and these codes are also included in the study. This allows scientists to work on the virus.

The animals in the list in the photo were served at a meeting for 40 thousand people in China, and the virus spread after that day. The animal list, which presented with the prices in the photo, belongs to the list of animals sold in live animal markets in China. And there is no information regarding a meeting of 40 thousand people in this city.

Bill Gates predicted that the coronavirus pandemic would kill 65 million people and created a vaccine to eradicate Africans. The Bill Gates foundation funded a simulation which was not a prediction of the current pandemic and Bill Gates did not create a vaccine for coronavirus.

A vaccine for the coronavirus was being trialled in January 2020 days before the outbreak. Incorrect. The trial referenced was for a different type of coronavirus—Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS).
North Korea will kill anyone who gets COVID-19. Nothing indicates that this is true. There was no such announcement.  North Korea announced other measures against COVID-19.
Coronavirus does spreads through frozen food. Coronavirus does not spread through frozen food.

Event 201 “gave out stuffed souvenir coronavirus toys” to “commemorate” novel coronavirus outbreak. Event 201 used a fictionalized coronavirus outbreak as its pandemic scenario but did not "predict" the outbreak of a strain that would be detected two months later in December 2019 in Wuhan, China.

Videos of people infected with the new coronavirus in China. In both cases, it can't corroborate the origin of the material. Besides, there hasn't been an official pronouncement of any Chinese authority in health matter.

A Saudi Arabian study for a MERS vaccine is linked to the outbreak of coronavirus. Based on the evidence, AAP FactCheck found the Facebook post to be false. The Saudi clinical trial is investigating a vaccine for the MERS coronavirus strain, not the 2019 Novel coronavirus.

Post claims food products such as rice, fortune cookies, mi goreng noodles, ice tea and “Chinese red bull” are contaminated with coronavirus in Australia. Also some areas of Sydney are supposedly identified as contaminated. AAP FactCheck found the Facebook post to be false. A viral infectious diseases expert says there is no evidence of food being a source of any coronavirus transmission. The Facebook post also lists information from the “Department of Diseasology Parramatta” conducting tests showing “positive readings” for the virus at train stations in four Sydney suburbs. NSW Health confirmed to AAP Fact Check there is no such organisation as the “Department of Diseasology Parramatta” and there have been no “positive readings” at train stations.
There are several new confirmed cases in several French cities. Hospitals and authorities denied such claims in various cities.
Food and locations are contaminated in Australia. Authorities denied those claims on Jan. 27
This woman in Malaysia died of coronavirus. Family says there is no evidence of a coronavirus infection.

Water used in an islamic ablution ritual can kill the novel coronavirus. Health experts warn that water alone cannot kill the virus and recommend that people wash their hands with soap and water for effective protection.

Raúl Rodolfo Abhduz Khan, biochemical engineer from Karmalah Laboratories, is the creator of the novel coronavirus. The person in the image is a YouTuber from Spain named Raúl Álvarez, aka AuronPlay. His image is commonly used to create disinformation, i.e. he was blamed for the fire in Notre Dame and in the Amazonas. The image is manipulated in order to show seem like it was reported by CNN en Español.

The Indian health department has issued a notification advising people to drink only 50-80 ml of water, avoid spicy food, and not travel in crowded spaces till March 2020. There has been no notification suggesting drinking only a certain amount of water, avoiding spicy food and improving the intake of vitamin C prevent coronavirus. The "children-are-more-vulnerable theory" is also not scientifically backed. As of Jan. 27, there were no confirmed cases in India and the death toll had reached 106 in China.

New strain of virus was already patented; Bill Gates funds institute which holds patent; Bill Gates predicted the outbreak and 65 Million Deaths. There are many patents for coronaviruses, but those are for different strains, not the one that recently broke out in China. Bill Gates has not predicted the outbreak.

Everything is much worse than reported; the current virus is worse than SARS; it causes red rashes on the skin, media is not reporting enough; people are falling over from the virus in the streets. The video is spreading unproven, misleading and partly false claims about the outbreak of the new coronavirus.

A seafood market is the source of the novel coronavirus, strange animals and foods were sold there, such as batsoup and snakes. It is possible that animals transmitted the virus to people. Many of the first patient had visited the market. However, a direct link has not yet been proven.

156,000 people died in China due to the coronavirus, 90,000 only in Wuhan. The article was based on a Russian YouTube video that was actually based on another article written by an infamous conspiracy fake news website. Figures had no reliable source of information.

Coronavirus spreads in Ecuadorian cities (Quito – Guayaquil). The Ministry of Public Health analyzes a suspicious case. As of Jan 27, there is no confirmation about the presence of the virus in Ecuador.
The Health Authority confirmed 3 cases of the 2019 coronavirus in the country. There are no confirmed cases as of Jan. 27.

A doctor in the Wuhan hospital was seen collapsing and later lost his life as a result of being infected from the coronavirus 2019-nCoV in front of patients and hospital staff. The incident which was captured in the video in question was a violent attack in the public hospital at the city of Quzhou, at the Hejing county in China. The doctor and two of his colleagues were injured by the relative of a patient who lost his life after an acute myocardial infarction.

American radio host spreads misinformation about number of deaths and infected with coronavirus; rumors get to Brazil. The text on Facebook only quotes Hal Turner radio show. The american states having worked 15 years on FBI. In fact, Hal Turner never worked on FBI, only as a consultant between 2003 and 2007. Furthermore, his radio show has already spread other fake news checked by american fact-checking agency Lead Stories.
Coronavirus may have originated in a lab linked to China’s biowarfare program. Please click the link to read the full article
10,000 people have died in Wuhan, China. As of early Jan. 27, the estimated death toll is 81 — all of them in China.

A “Chinese spy team” working in a Canadian government lab sent “pathogens to the Wuhan facility” prior to the coronavirus outbreak. Eric Morrissette, a spokesman for the Public Health Agency of Canada, told FactCheck.org by email that, “this is misinformation and there is no factual basis for claims being made on social media.”

Coronavirus has an effect on a person’s lips. The video shared a effect of coronavirus on a patient lip is found to be on the internet at least since November-2019, before the recent epidemic broke out. So, it is not related to the recent coronavirus epidemic.
BIll Gates contributed to the spread of coronavirus. The work that Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation does on healthcare has in no way contributed to the spread of coronavirus.
Video of Wuhan market with dogs, snakes, rats and bats… Video taken in Indonesia (Langowan)

Close-up of a bat soup bowl that is eaten in Wuhan, or elsewhre in China. A local source in Palau said he recognized a specific local restaurant. Table, room setting and plates' decorations match with other pictures found online showing tourist dining in unspecified restaurant in Palau. Not enough elements for us to call it false but pretty close.
This video shows a woman eating a bat soup in Wuhan. Video shot in Palau in 2016.

This video shows a man eating a bat soup in a restaurant in China. With identified many elements in the video that matched pictures published by Chinese bloggers who visited Palau and documented their trip.
Filipinos are eating a bat soup in Wuhan. YouTubers made the video last July in Palau.
Bat market and bat meat being sold in Wuhan. Video taken in Indonesia (Manado)
Video of Wuhan market with dogs, snakes, rats and bats… Video taken in Indonesia (Langowan)

A package from AliExpress sent from China can spread the new coronavirus. The coronavirus need a living host to grow. This kind of virus lives only a few days in a liquid and only a few hours on an object. The virus would die during the long transport from China to France, for example. The scientist never observed this king of contamination before with any kind of coronavirus.
The coronavirus was created and patented by an American lab two years before the pandemic. These pre-existing patents are referring to other viruses and coronaviruses.
An explosion that occurred in Wuhan, China, is tied to the coronavirus outbreak. This is actually the footage of the first of several explosions in Tianjin, China, in 2015.

Spreading coronavirus is the interest of the USA, because American laboratories are operating not only around Russia but in the surroundings of Asian countries and in Georgia (Lugar lab). There are several conspiracy narratives developed in the report, including on US Labs artificially linked to the coronavirus. In the context of conspiracy narrative, the story author names Tbilisi-based Lugar Laboratory of biological research, making an unreasonable parallel between virus found in China and Tbilisi Laboratory. Moreover, the story features the archive material from 2018, in which former Georgian Minister of Security Igor Giorgadze talks about the threats coming from the Lugar Lab. Lugar Laboratory is a part of the National Center for Disease Control and Public Health of Ministry of Health of Georgia. For years, Lugar Lab has been a target of Kremlin, Russia affiliated media, Russian politicians and high officials. Except for US-financed C Hepatitis Treatment program, there are other conspiracies linked to the lab.

Event 201 “gave out stuffed souvenir coronavirus toys” to “commemorate” novel coronavirus outbreak. Event 201 used a fictionalized coronavirus outbreak as its pandemic scenario but did not "predict" the outbreak of a strain that would be detected two months later in December 2019 in Wuhan, China.
10,000 people have died in Wuhan, China. Please click the link to read the full article
China “stole coronavirus from Canada and weaponized it into a Bioweapon.” Please click the link to read the full article

The Chinese Communist Party “will finally admit that the real source of the coronavirus is from ‘a lab in Wuhan’ linked to its covert biological weapon programs.” Please click the link to read the full article

A post says the coronavirus can be slowed or stopped with the “immediate widespread use of high doses of vitamin C.” The claim was originally shared on an alternative medical website that promotes nutritional supplementation.

A “patient tested positive” for the 2019 novel coronavirus (nCoV) at the Makati Medical Center. As of Jan. 28 and according to the Department of Health (DOH), there has been no confirmed cases of the 2019 nCoV in the Philippines.

Videos of people infected with the new coronavirus in China. In both cases, it can't corroborate the origin of the material. Besides, there hasn't been an official pronouncement of any Chinese authority in health matter.

The coronavirus is related to the treatment given to Uighur Muslims by China There is no link at all between the emergence of the new coronavirus with how China treats Muslim Uighurs. The spread of the 2019 coronavirus has become a global health challenge after the advent of SARS in 2002 and MERS in 2013.

The novel coronavirus has reached Cebu province and Boracay Island, which are popular tourists destinations. There is no confirmed positive case of the newly-detected 2019 nCoV in the Philippines at this time. This was clarified by Health Secretary Francisco Duque III in a Jan. 27 interview with CNN Philippines. He emphasized this in a separate press conference in Malacanang, where he also reported that the five-year-old boy suspected of having the disease tested negative.
Ukrainian media registered the first confirmed case of the new coronavirus. As of Jan. 27, this was not the case. There are several strains of coronavirus

A post says the coronavirus can be slowed or stopped with the “immediate widespread use of high doses of vitamin C.” The claim was originally shared on an alternative medical website that promotes nutritional supplementation.

“In ‘Resident Evil’ the Umbrella Corporation releases a virus that infects the people of Raccoon City. A biological research lab with the exact same logo as the Umbrella Corporation can be found in the city where the coronavirus outbreak originated.” There’s no evidence that the 2019 coronavirus that was first detected in Wuhan was created in a lab. It likely has its origins in bats, according to the CDC.

Effects of the new coronavirus on an infected person’s lips. The video shared a effect of coronavirus on a patient lip is found to be on the internet at least since November-2019, before the recent epidemic broke out. So, it is not related to the recent coronavirus epidemic.

An Israeli analyst suggests that the coronavirus might be a biological weapon created in a laboratory. Analyst Dany Shoham told FactCheck.KZ that he was indeed interviewed by the Washington Times, but the website published only a part of his answer. He said there is no evidence that such thing has happened.

“Coronavirus in China: more than 30 million quarantined, 2.8 million infected; 112,000 dead! People falling on the streets and trains! Supermarkets without food!” "No official source has confirmed these numbers. There were 81 dead and 2,840 cases confirmed until January 27th. Hal Turner never worked at the FBI. He was only an informer".
Coronavirus killed 112,000 people in China. Please click the link to read the full article

Video shows a woman eating a bat soup in Wuhan. We tracked the girl's social media accounts, confirmed they were authentic. She claims the video was taken over the summer but wouldn't tell were. The setup and meal look like Palau traditional bat soup but we couldn't confirm.

Close-up of a bat soup bowl eaten in Wuhan, or elsewhere in China. A local source in Palau said he recognized a specific local restaurant. Table, room setting and plates' decorations match with other pictures found online showing tourist dining in unspecified restaurant in Palau. Not enough elements for us to call it false but pretty close.
This video shows a woman eating a bat soup in Wuhan. This video was shot in Palau, in 2016.
This video shows a man eating a bat soup in a restaurant in China. Many elements in the video matched pictures published by Chinese bloggers who visited Palau and documented their trip.
Filipinos are eating a bat soup in Wuhan. YouTubers made the video last July in Palau.
Bat market and bat meat are being sold in Wuhan. This video was taken in Manado, Indonesia.
Video of Wuhan market with dogs, snakes, rats and bats. This video was taken in Indonesia (Langowan)

The coronavirus can be slowed or stopped with the “immediate widespread use of high doses of vitamin C.” There’s currently no vaccine or medicine recommended to treat the current coronavirus, and there’s no evidence high doses of vitamin C has any effect.

The coronavirus can be slowed or stopped with the “immediate widespread use of high doses of vitamin C.” The claim was originally shared on an alternative medical website that promotes nutritional supplementation.

Chinese doctor Zhong Nanshan advised to rinse your mouth with salty water to prevent 2019n-Cov. Nan-shan Zhong hasn't made such comment. There is no evidence that rinsing the mouth with salty water can prevent COVID-19.
This video shows the Wuhan market where the virus comes from. The video actually shows a market in Indonesia.
Queensland issued travel warning for Wuhan and Chinese-populated areas in Australia. On Jan. 26, Queensland said they did not take this measure
Coronavirus is a type of rabies. Authorities say it's a hoax, the two viruses are different.

The director of a major hospital in São Paulo, Brazil, has recommended drinking fennel tea and eating bull’s liver as ways of prevention against COVID-19. The recommendations made on the text do not follow WHO's pattern and include a false information about the medicine Tamiflu. Furthermore, the hospital said its board of directors didn't send out any alert of this kind.
The first infected person in Kazakhstan is in Almaty. Please click the link to read the full article
Indian nurse in Jeddah (Saudi Arabia) has been detected with novel coronavirus(2019-nCOV). Official government handles have clarified that the Indian nurse is not suffering from the deadly 2019-Ncov.

There is a Chinese patient at the Hi-Precision Diagnostics clinic in Alabang, Philippines, who was tested positive for the novel coronavirus or 2019 nCoV. In a press briefing on Tuesday, Jan. 28, the Department of Health (DOH) announced that there was still no confirmed case of 2019 nCoV in the country. The patient at Asian Hospital and Medical Center in Alabang, Muntinlupa City is among the 24 citizens who are under investigation (PUIs) for a possible 2019 nCoV infection.

The 2019 novel coronavirus (nCoV) is a “type of rabies” that can be contracted by eating bats. In a press briefing on Tuesday, Jan. 28, Health Secretary Francisco Duque III clarified that the 2019 nCoV belongs to the Coronaviridae family of viruses. Meanwhile, rabies is from Rhabdoviridae.

“Wuhan Virus” is named SARI. Steroid is the medicine to cure it. Acetic acid can be used to prevent it. 1."Wuhan Virus" is named as "2019n-Cov".2.Steroid is not used for curing it. 3. Spraying acetic acid in air can not help prevent it.

Coronavirus dies at 56°C, so eat cooked food and turn on AC. Plus, Ethanol can kill the “Wuhan Virus”. Turning on the heater can not kill coronavirus. Both alcohol and chlorine can be useful to disinfect surfaces, but they can not cure COVID-19 and need to be used under appropriate recommendations.

Chinese doctor Zhong Nanshan advised to rinse your mouth with salty water to prevent 2019n-Cov. Nan-shan Zhong hasn't made such comment. There is no evidence that rinsing the mouth with salty water can prevent COVID-19.

The roll-out of 5G is causing coronavirus or coronavirus-like symptoms. The effect of 5G on the public's health is a long-standing cause of concern, also in the Dutch language area on local Facebook groups such as 5G-plein. At the end of January, coronavirus has started to be mentioned in these groups as a by-product of the roll-out of 5G (cf. Thomas Cowan's youtube video). There is no proof for this.

The dangerous virus is transmitted through bananas. The publication does not explicitly refer to the new coronavirus. It relates to the nonexistent n7n9 virus. Regardless, bananas do not play a special role in the spread of viruses.
Coronavirus has been originated in a laboratory linked to China’s biowarfare program. There is no evidence that the coronavirus 2019-nCoV was created in a Chinese laboratory.

The coronavirus is patented by Pirbright University. Coronaviruses are a group of similar looking viruses. The patent by Pirbright University is for the Avian Infectious bronchitis virus (IBV) which is found in fowls, pheasants and turkeys. This patent is not linked to the current 2019-novel coronavirus.

A salesman in Medellín’s El Hueco market was sent to a hospital with coronavirus symptoms. Colombia's Ministry of Health reports no confirmed cases of coronavirus infections in Colombia. Medellín's Secretary of Health also reports no cases in their city.
The virus was created by humans and patented. The patents exist but are not for the 2019 coronavirus.

Chinese scientists expelled from a Canadian microbiology lab took the novel coronavirus strain with them to China. The two scientists at the National Microbiology Lab (Winnipeg, Canada) are suspected to have sent live Ebola and Henipah viruses to Beijing in March 2019, but it has nothing to do with the coronavirus. They were expelled from the lab, but are not considered spies.

A CBC news report would said that Chinese scientists from a Canadian lab sent the coronavirus to Wuhan. Nothing in the CBC report (and 2 subsequent reports) said anything about "spies", or even coronavirus, and no link is done between the expulsion of these two scientists in July 2019 and the virus.

Authorities have identified that the international chemical-warfare terrorist ‘Samuel Whitcomb Hyde’ is behind the deadly China ‘coronavirus.’” It's a long-running internet hoax. Sam Hyde is a comedian who is the frequent target of such hoaxes

DailyMail reported that a virus leaked from the Wuhan National Biosafety Laboratory was responsible for the pandemic. The DailyMail article didn’t report that. Rutgers University microbiologist Dr Richard Ebright told DailyMail that "at this point there’s no reason to harbour suspicions" that the facility had anything to do with the outbreak, besides being responsible for the crucial genome sequencing that lets doctors diagnose it.
A spray could protect against the coronavirus outbreak. The product being hawked by the Genesis Church 2 is essentially bleach.

A tabletop exercise using a model of the current outbreak “predicted” 65 million people could die from the coronavirus. There was no prediction made at the tabletop exercise. It was held in October of 2019 and used a different model of the coronavirus. No predicted death toll was estimated by the groups.
Coronavirus has been originated in a laboratory linked to China’s biowarfare program. There is no evidence that the coronavirus 2019-nCoV was created in a Chinese laboratory.

A French member of parliament, Dominique Da Silva, said he hopes the coronavirus will kill people older than 70. The deputy's speech was meant to be satire, but it was misleading and shocked some people.
The SARS-CoV-2 was created in 2003 in the United States. The patent that some people shared isn't related to the SARS-Cov-2 but to another coronavirus.
Doctors said the entire Wuhan population will die of the novel coronavirus. Authorities never said that and U.S CDC said most people will recover on their own.

“They create diseases to offer vaccines. There is already a patent for an attenuated coronavirus.” The Pirbright Institute has a patent for an attenuated form of a different strain of coronavirus, the infectious bronchitis virus (IBV). It only affects poultry.

Coronavirus may have spread due to the consumption of bat soup, according to scientists. There is no evidence to support the claim that the consumption of bat soup is connected to the transmission of the 2019-nCoV. One recent study indicates that the new virus does share genetic information with other kinds of coronaviruses that infect bats, but it is still unclear which animals may have transmitted the virus to humans. Analyzing a genetic database, researchers concluded that Chinese snakes are the most likely reservoir for the new pathogen, but the hypothesis has yet to be tested experimentally.

A Chinese person, who was taken from Kansai airport (in Osaka, Japan) to a hospital, has run away before they could be tested. According to the Kansai Airport Quarantine Station, this information is absolutely false.

A new case of novel coronavirus was registered in Saudi Arabia. A nurse from India was diagnosed with the specific strain of the virus. According to Dr. Tarik Al Azraqi, head of the committee for infectious diseases in Saudi Arabia, the nurse was diagnosed and received treatment for MERS not 2019-nCoV.

“So let me get this straight about this virus. It’s “new” yet it was lab created and patented in 2015 (in development since 03’).” All of the posts link to patents that are related to two different viruses in the coronavirus family. There is no patent related to the new virus

A Chinese woman from Wuhan arrived in France with suspected symptoms of coronavirus. The Chinese embassy in France confirmed the presence of this Chinese woman in France and said that she gave reassuring news. According to French authorities, investigations are underway, but this suspicious case has never been officially reported.

A 2015 research article about a lab-made coronavirus referred to the current outbreak. It was an opinion piece, and while facts used in the article appear accurate, it did not refer to the current coronavirus outbreak.
That the China-centered coronavirus had infected 2.8 million people and killed 112,000. This was a wild exaggeration of the facts. As of Jan. 24, some 900 people had been infected and 26 had died.

There’s a ‘coronavirus patent’, FEMA ‘proposes martial law’, Gates Foundation predicted virus, ‘funded group who owns virus patent’, coronavirus was ‘created in a lab’ as a ‘bioweapon for population control’. Please click the link to read the full article

“Confirmed cases” of the novel coronavirus or 2019 nCoV were recorded at the Philippine Bank of Communications (PBCom) Tower in Makati City, according to a message that circulated Friday, Jan. 24. Speaking to reporters on January 24, Health Undersecretary Eric Domingo maintained that there is still no confirmed case of the 2019 nCov in the Philippines. The management of PBCom Tower also said there is “no truth” to the information.

“The new fad disease called the ‘coronavirus’ is sweeping headlines. “[The coronavirus is] ‘new’ yet it was lab-created and patented in 2015”. The post references the Wuhan coronavirus, but the patent filed is clearly stated to be for the SARS coronavirus, which caused the 2003 outbreak. Neither the SARS nor Wuhan coronavirus is lab-created; evidence points to an animal reservoir as the source of infection.

The novel coronavirus was made in a lab and is now spread as a way to force vaccinate people. There is still no vaccine for the new coronavirus, according to the National Board of Health. The claims most often refer to a "patent" related to the coronavirus. The patent is supposed to prove that a vaccine already exists and that the pharmaceutical industry is behind the outbreak of coronavirus. But the patent is instead about the SARS virus that killed hundreds of people in the outbreak of 2002, or the species of the coronavirus that hit birds.

The first case of new coronavirus in Venezuela has been registered. It comes from the Bolivar state. As Jan. 23, The Association of Doctors in the State of Bolivar had publicly denied this information.

“[The coronavirus is] ‘new’ yet it was lab-created and patented in 2015”. The post references the Wuhan coronavirus, but the patent filed is clearly stated to be for the SARS coronavirus, which caused the 2003 outbreak. Coronavirus was created in a lab in order to destroy the Chinese economy. The vaccine is already available. Claims that say that a "mutation of the virus corona was caused artificially in the laboratory" and that the new coronavirus is a "biological war" released to "weaken the Chinese economy" are considered conspiracy theories because there are no evidences to support those arguments.
Warning: the virus is spreading in Italy (January 22). Until Jan. 22, this information hadn't been confirmed by any national or local newspaper nor by any member of the Italian government.

Russian scientists have found a cure for the new Chinese virus. As of Jan. 22, there has been no new information on Trizivir drug testing or its results. Triazavirin had not been confirmed as a cure for the new coronavirus. Even though the headline used on Sputnik's article claims that the Russian drug Triazavirin is "ready" to be used against COVID-19, the article does not contain this information.

The new coronavirus outbreak is linked to eating bats. Bats are known natural reservoirs for coronaviruses. However, many other animals, such as civet cats and snakes, can also carry these viruses. There is currently not enough evidence to conclude that the 2019 coronavirus outbreak resulted from people eating bats in Wuhan, China.
Saline solutions can kill the new coronavirus. The WHO and many doctors deny this claim.
You have to wear a disposable mask with the blue side out if you are sick and the white side out if you are not. The only way to wear a mask is with the blue face out, experts told AFP.

Chinese influencer caused the new coronavirus outbreak after eating bat soup. The footage was filmed in 2016 in Micronesia, and not in China.

“A patent on this ‘new’ coronavirus expired on the 22nd (of January), today”. A patent for the vaccine for the new coronavirus did not expire on January 22, 2020. The patent that can be seen in this Instagram post is related to the SARS epidemic, which killed more than 800 people after it broke out in China in 2002.

The coronavirus was created in a lab and patented. The patents circulating are linked to other coronaviruses and a patent for a virus does not mean it's man made.
A Chinese market caused the new coronavirus (video). The video is misleading.

The peak of the new coronavirus will happen in two weeks (from Jan 18). During those two weeks, all the infections will occur, then there will be two very calm weeks and another two until it will all go down. Authorities say that what lasts two weeks or less is the incubation period.

Stores and supermarkets in Veracruz (Mexico) will close due to the new coronavirus. The local government has asked people to buy supplies. As of Mar. 18, stores had not said they would close because of the new coronavirus. Authorities asked people not to panic and to avoid big purchases.

A chain message circulated on Tuesday, Jan. 14, warning people to avoid going to Shangri-La Plaza (a mall in Mandaluyong City) because of a supposed case of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) reported in one of the mall’s medical clinics. The Department of Health (DOH) and Healthway Medical both issued advisories denying the claim that was being spread through a chain message.
